title: When We Ride
lyrics:
[Intro: 2Pac]
Outlaw Immortalz
Bow down to somethin' greater than yourself, trick
Individuals capable of enormous amounts of chin checks and eye swolls, they know
You watchin' but you ain't seein' what lies before you, biatch
Picture, if you will
Seven deadly human beings blessed with the gift of speech
The power to reach each nigga on every street
May the heavenly Father look down and be proud of what transpired
Since the day the seed was planted
The G grew but we know he'd have a clique
Smoked out, loced out, all into shit
Just me and my dogs, livin' like hogs, Outlaw Immortalz
What follows is the story, what proceeded was the glue
What lies between is the fiction
Don't fuck around and make it true

My adversaries crumble, when we rumble it's a catastrophe
Out for revenge on bitch niggas that blasted me
Plus, my alias is Makaveli
A loaded .357 with hollow points to a nigga belly
Bust him to see if he bleed
He shoulda never fucked around with a sick-ass nigga like me

Best be prepared for the Outlawz, here we come

[Verse 4: Napoleon & 
2Pac
]

Before a nigga finish with puttin' in work, I better end up with somethin'
I think these niggas got the game fucked up
If they don't believe that a young nigga like me would bust (
Boo-ya
)
Perhaps it's a must, I'm facin' cases, fuck probation
Is what I'm screamin' when these money hungry cops be chasin'

When we ride
Thug nigga 'til we die

Inglewood's banger, keepin' one in the chamber
For the anger that I build inside, when it's time to ride
Suicidal thoughts lurk fuckin' no end to revenge
Fuck any, my alias Mussolini (
Huh

They call me E.D.I., from the side of seedy

It ain't nothin', 'cause if they wantin' somethin'
So I'ma commence to dump and stomp down and struck up while my beat is bumpin', thuggin'
To my fuckin' last note, with Lil' 'Pole and Kastro
Who you thought was on that asshole? Don't ask, though
Outlaw Immortalz doin' this dit-nirt on the slide
Ain't no chance to hide when we ride

[Verse 7: Yaki Kadafi]
My alias Kadafi, Trump tight so feds can't copy
